column2: "Asɛm a ofi EWURADZE nkyɛn baa Jeremia hɔ wɔ Judahen Josia ne ba Jehoiakim ne nda no mu dɛ

column4: na fa hɔn bra EWURADZE fie mpia no kor mu
column5: na ma hɔn nsa ma wɔnnom."

column2: "Nna mefaa Habazinia ba Jeremia ne ba Jaazania

column3: wɔ Nyame nyimpa Igdalia ba Hanan ne mbabanyin hɔn pia no a ɔwɔ abowanohwɛfo Sallum ba Maaseia ne pia etsifi no mu:"

column2: "na medze kuraba a nsa ahyehyɛ no amaama

column3: Yɛnnkɔnom nsa biara: na hɛn egya Rekab ne ba Jonadab hyɛɛ hɛn

column5: anaa wonnya bi: na mbom hom ntsena asese mu hom nda nyina; ama hom aatsena ase nda pii wɔ asaase a hom yɛ do amamforafo no mu."

column2: "Na yɛayɛ setsie ama hɛn egya Rekab ne ba Jonadab wɔ dza ɔdze hyɛɛ hɛn nyinara ho dɛ
column3: mma yɛnnom nsa hɛn nda nyinara

column2: "anaaso yennsisi adan yɛnntsena mu: eso yennyi wenyin ture

column4: na yɛayɛ dɛ mbrɛ hɛn egya Jonadab hyɛɛ hɛn no nyinara."

column3: ber a Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar tui baa asaase yi do no
column5: Hom mbra ma yɛnkɔ Jerusalɛm wɔ Kaldeafo dɔm ho hu ntsi
column6: na Siriafo dɔm ho hu ntsi; nna yɛtse Jerusalɛm yi."

column8: na kɛse Juda mbarimba na Jerusalɛm atsefo dɛ
column9: Aso hom nnkɛgye nkyerɛkyerɛ dɛ hom betsie me nsɛm bi a? EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Nsɛm a Rekab ba Jonadab dze hyɛɛ ne mbabanyin dɛ mma wɔnnom nsa no
column4: na ɔdze bodu ndɛ da yi wɔnnoom bi
column5: osiandɛ wodzi hɔn egya ne mbrasɛm do: na emi dze
column7: mosoɛr ahema na mekasa; na hom enntsie me."

column2: "Masoma mo nkowaa nkɔnhyɛfo no nyinara aba hom nkyɛn
column3: eso mosoɛr ahema na mosoma hɔn
column5: Afei hom mu nyimpa biara nsan mfi no kwan bɔn no do
column7: na mma onnkedzi abosom afofor bi ekyir nnkɔsom hɔn
column8: na hom atsena asaase a medze mama hom na hom egyanom no do: na mbom hom ammbrɛ hom aso adze

column2: "Susuampaara dɛ Rekab na Jonadab ne mba woedzi mbrasɛm a hɔn egya dze hyɛɛ hɔn no do no

column6: medze mbusu nyina a maka etsia Juda na Jerusalɛm atsefo nyinara no mebɛba hɔn do: osiandɛ makasa akyerɛ hɔn

column2: "Na Jeremia see Rekabfo fi no dɛ
column5: se nye yi: Osiandɛ hom etsie hom egya Jonadab ne mbrasɛm
column6: na hom edzi n’ahyɛdze nyinara do
column7: na hom ayɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔhyɛɛ hom nyinara ntsi;"

column4: se nye yi: Ɔbarimba a ogyina m’enyim nnkɔbɔ Rekab ba Jonadab ara da."
